body:
## Problem
Access control system unverified. AccessGrant model exists but unknown if:
- Access grants created on purchase
- Viewers can only access purchased content
- Free vs paid logic works correctly
- Expiration handling works

## Required Work
- [ ] Verify purchase creates AccessGrant
- [ ] Test viewer can access purchased streams
- [ ] Test viewer blocked from unpurchased streams  
- [ ] Test free access pass logic
- [ ] Test paid access pass logic
- [ ] Implement expiration verification
- [ ] Add comprehensive access control tests

## Success Criteria
- [ ] Purchase flow creates valid AccessGrant
- [ ] Unauthorized viewers redirected to purchase
- [ ] Authorized viewers can watch streams
- [ ] Expired grants handled correctly
- [ ] 100% test coverage for access logic

## Security Impact
ðŸ”´ **CRITICAL** - Revenue-impacting security issue. Could allow unauthorized free access to paid content.

## Estimated Effort
1-2 days

## Dependencies
Requires test suite stability (issue #50)
title: [CRITICAL] Access Control Security Verification
